original: nyā. pa. pra. 1 patyuḥ saṃyamināṃ praṇamya caraṇau tatpādakoṭīrayoḥ saṃbandhena samidhyamānavibhavān dhanyāṃstathānyān gurūn /
analyzed: patyuḥ saṃyaminām praṇamya caraṇau tad pāda koṭīrayoḥ saṃbandhena samidhyamāna vibhavān dhanyān tathā anyān gurūn

original: śuddhaṃ saṃśritabādarāyaṇatanornārāyaṇasyoktibhaḥ śrīmān veṅkaṭanāyakaḥ sthitipadaṃ nirmāti nīteḥ śubham //
analyzed: śuddham saṃśrita bādarāyaṇa tanoḥ nārāyaṇasya uktibhaḥ śrīmān veṅkaṭanāyakaḥ sthiti padam nirmāti nīteḥ śubham
vidyā sthāneṣu dharmyeṣu gaṇyate nyāya vistaraḥ
sa ca viplāvitaḥ taiḥ taiḥ tatas tra pariśodhyate
nyā pa pra
gautamasūtra bahiṣkāra pakṣaḥ
yadi api kathañcid ākṣapādam sat pakṣe nikṣeptu śakyam
na ca kaṇabhakṣa pakṣa nikṣepa vat kleśaḥ
na api tad kartā gautamaḥ tāmaseṣu paripaṭhyate
nā api ca vipralambhaka tva khyātiḥ
tathā api brahmasūtrakāra ādi bahiṣkṛta tvāt na atīva vayam ādriyāmahe
na khalu ārṣa tva ādibhiḥ tad ādaraḥ
atiprasaṅgāt

original: prājñānāṃ prathamenaiva guruṇā hi svayaṃ purā /
analyzed: prājñānām prathamena eva guruṇā hi svayam purā
athavā pitāmahaḥ eva atra pramāṇam
yaḥ indra virocanāyoḥ cārvāka matam upadiṣṭavān
tathā gautamaḥ pi saṃbhāvyate
atha api
kāṇāda śākya pāṣaṇḍaiḥ trayī dharmaḥ vilopitaḥ
tridaṇḍa dhāriṇā pūrvam viṣṇunā rakṣitā trayī
iti smṛteḥ
bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ rājan sāṃkhya yoga vicāriṇaḥ
na ete icchanti puruṣam ekam kuru kula udbhava
samāsena tu tat vyāsaḥ puruṣa aikātmyam uktavān
iti mahābhārata ukteḥ ca yuktam tad tad bahiṣkāraḥ
iha tu na tathā iti ced na
tulya nyāya tayā vacanasya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt
na khalu tat vā tādṛś vā iti kaścid viśeṣaḥ
yadi api kāśa kuśa avalamba nyāyena pakṣa antarāt ādhikyam asya pakṣasya
atha api na tat vedānta saṃnidhau
na khalu maśakāt baliṣṭhaḥ pi mātaṅgaḥ kaṇṭhī ravam uparuṇaddhi

original: “yadakṣapādaḥ pravaro munīnāṃ śamāya śāstraṃ jagato jagāda /
analyzed: yat akṣapādaḥ pravaraḥ munīnām śamāya śāstram jagataḥ jagāda
ku tārkika ajñāna nivṛtti hetuḥ tasya mayā nibandhaḥ
iti vākyam akṣapāda pakṣapātena uktam iti anāstheyam
uktam ca pūrva ācāryaiḥ
kāṇādam ākṣapādam vā kāpilam tantram eva vā
tantrāṇi etāni sarvāṇi na tantrāṇi ātma nirṇarya
iti

original: ata eva hi “etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ” iti sūtre bhāṣitam---“etena---vedāparigṛhītasāṃkhyapakṣakṣapaṇena,
analyzed: atas eva hi etena śiṣṭa aparigrahāḥ api vyākhyātāḥ iti sūtre bhāṣitam etena veda aparigṛhīta sāṃkhya pakṣa kṣapaṇena

original: śiṣṭāśca vedāparigṛhītāḥ kaṇabhakṣākṣapādakṣapaṇakabhipakṣāḥ kṣapitā veditavyāḥ” iti /
analyzed: śiṣṭāḥ ca veda a parigṛhītāḥ kaṇabhakṣa akṣapāda kṣapaṇa kabhipakṣāḥ kṣapitāḥ veditavyāḥ iti

original: na ca sūtranibaddhaṃ sarvaṃ vidyāsthānamiti niyamo dṛṣṭaḥ;
analyzed: na ca sūtra nibaddham sarvam vidyā sthānam iti niyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: na caika evaikasya vidyāsthānasya sūtrakṛdityapi vā ṛṣirityeva vā rājājñā,
analyzed: na ca ekaḥ eva ekasya vidyā sthānasya sūtra kṛt iti api vā ṛṣiḥ iti eva vā rāja ājñā
anyaiḥ api ca tad karaṇa darśanāt
pramāṇa śabdasya bhāve karaṇe ca vyutpattiḥ
evam ca pramā eva pramāṇam iti eke
pramā karaṇam eva iti apare
tayoḥ anyatarat iti anye

original: 5 yadajñānāt saṃsāro yajjñānāt tannivṛttistat prameyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ prakarṣeṇa meyatvāt /
analyzed: yad ajñānāt saṃsāraḥ yad jñānāt tad nivṛttiḥ tat prameyam mumukṣubhiḥ prakarṣeṇa meya tvāt
tat dvividham dravya a dravya bhedāt
sāmānyatas vā pramā viṣayaḥ prameyam
āgantuka dharma āśrayaḥ
a tathābhūtam adravyam
dravyam dvedhā jaḍam ajaḍam iti

original: 11 jaḍaṃ ca dvedhā prakṛtiḥ kāla iti /
analyzed: jaḍam ca dvedhā prakṛtiḥ kālaḥ iti
ajaḍam ca tathā pratyak parāk iti
pratyak api dvividham iti
parāk api tathā dharma bhūta jñānam nitya vibhūtiḥ ca iti
athavā dravyam dvividham ātma anātma bhedāt
tredhā vā bhoktṛ bhogya niyantṛ śruti anusārāt
ṣoḍhā vā triguṇa kāla jīva īśvara śuddha sattva mati bhedāt
svayam prakāśam ajaḍam
kālaḥ kṣaṇa lava ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ
svasmai bhāsamānam pratyak
parasmai bhāsamānam parāk
svatantraḥ iśvaraḥ
artha prakāśaḥ buddhiḥ
adravyam anekadhā sattva śabda ādi vaicitryāt

original: 29 ekaṃ vetaraviśiṣṭaṃ prādhānyataḥ prameyaṃ paraṃ brahma /
analyzed: ekam vā itara viśiṣṭam prādhānyataḥ prameyam param brahma
itareṣām sva niṣṭha brahma eka niṣṭha tvāt

original: 31 tasyaiva ca tathātvena mumukṣubhiḥ prakarṣeṇa meyatvaśruteḥ /
analyzed: tasya eva ca tathātvena mumukṣubhiḥ prakarṣeṇa meya tva śruteḥ
ayathā vyavahāra kāraṇam jñānam viparyayaḥ
tad vyatiriktam jñānam anubhavaḥ
puruṣa pravṛtti uddeśyam prayojanam
vyāpti adhigama sthānam dṛṣṭāntaḥ
vīta rāga kathā vādaḥ
pratipakṣa sthāpana hīnā tu sā vitaṇḍā
hetvaṅga eka deśa vikalāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ
sva vyāpi dūṣaṇam jātiḥ
kathaka aśakti liṅgam nigrahasthānam

original: 49 ityetādṛśāni vākyāni kiṃ na sūtrāṇi syuḥ ?
analyzed: iti etādṛśāni vākyāni kim na sūtrāṇi syuḥ
tat iha saṃkṣiptam lakṣaṇa ādi vākyam sūtram
tad udāharaṇa ādi vākyam tu bhāṣya ādikam iti vibhāvya saṃtoṣṭavyam
na ca pūrva prābalya vyavasthā
tad pūrva saṃbhavāt vārtikasya ca anavatāra prasaṅgāt vyākaraṇa ādiṣu anyathā karaṇa svīkārāt ca

original: na ca jaimineḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇādiṣvaudāsīnyamātreṇa gautamokteṣu kāśyapokteṣu vā niḥśeṣānumatisiddhiriti mantavyam,
analyzed: na ca jaimineḥ pramāṇa lakṣaṇa ādiṣu audāsīnya mātreṇa gautama ukteṣu kāśyapa ukteṣu vā niḥśeṣa anumati siddhiḥ iti mantavyam
anya para tayā loka prasiddha upajīvanāt
para kalpita taṭāka upajīvana vat

original: karmakāṇḍavṛttikārādayo 'pi hi losiddhāṃ pramāṇādivyavasthāṃ yathāyathamanyathā saṃjagṛhuḥ /
analyzed: karmakāṇḍa vṛtti kāra ādayaḥ pi hi losiddhām pramāṇa ādi vyavasthām yathāyatham anyathā saṃjagṛhuḥ
atas yāvat iha yukti yuktam tāvat upajīvyate
na khalu taṭāka sthaḥ paṅkaḥ pya paṅkila buddhibhiḥ tad tad avagāhibhiḥ upajīvyate

original: ataḥ siṃhavanaguptinyāyena yathāvasthitanyāyānugṛhītaṃ vedaṃ vedānumataṃ ca nyāyamanusarāmaḥ,
analyzed: atas siṃhavanagupti nyāyena yathā avasthita nyāya anugṛhītam vedam veda anumatam ca nyāyam anusarāmaḥ
na punar nyāya mātram
yat tu jñāta saṃbandhasya ityādi grantham upādāya anantaram uktam śrī viṣṇucitteḥ vyāpti dhī garbha anubhavaḥ numānam iti arthaḥ
nyāya śāstre tu tad viśeṣa nirṇayaḥ iti
tat api tad nirūpaṇa adhikṛta vidyā sthāna khyāpana param

original: pramāṇādisūtramupādāya vyācakṣāṇaistatpakṣaniṣṭhairapi pūrvaiḥ kvacit sūtrāṇi nirākṛtāni /
analyzed: pramāṇa ādi sūtram upādāya vyācakṣāṇaiḥ tad pakṣa niṣṭhaiḥ api pūrvaiḥ kvacid sūtrāṇi nirākṛtāni
tad nyāyasya na asmāsu sarpa māraḥ
na api daṇḍa nivāraṇam

original: tataśca, yathālokaṃ yathāvedaṃ laukike vaidike 'pi ca /
analyzed: tatas ca yathālokam yathāvedam laukike vaidike ca

original: yo vaktā sa parigrāhyaḥ prāktano 'dyatano 'pi vā //
analyzed: yaḥ vaktā sa parigrāhyaḥ vā

original: vivakṣitārthāvaiśadyaṃ vyākulatvamapūrṇatā ullokatetyamī doṣā guṇakoṭau jaḍaiḥ kṛtāḥ //
analyzed: vivakṣita artha avaiśadyam vyākula tvam apūrṇa tā ulloka tā iti amī doṣāḥ guṇa koṭau jaḍaiḥ kṛtāḥ
bhagavan na artha munibhiḥ nyāya tattva samāhvayā
avadhīrya akṣapāda ādi nyabandhi nyāya paddhatiḥ
tad arvāgbhiḥ tathā ācāyaiḥ yatheṣṭam matam āsthitaiḥ
praṇinye bahudhā taiḥ taiḥ pramāṇa ādi vicāraṇā
tat ayam bhāṣya svaḥ sa siddhaḥ bahiṣkāra pakṣaḥ
nyā pa pra
gautamasūtra svīkāra pakṣaḥ
aṅgīkāra kāṅkṣiṇām akṣapādīyam api asmad ukta ekānta tayā sthāsyati
tathā eva sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ
atas vayam api mahatām ayukta artha tātparya kalpanena na aparādhyema
nyūnādhika viruddha vyapadeśa ādīnām alakṣaṇa lakṣaṇa uktīnām ca adhyāhāra anya paryāmyām tad bhakteḥ api nirvāhāt
tathā asmin yatra sphuṭaḥ śruti smṛti śārīraka virodhaḥ
saḥ uddeśataḥ niruhyate
yat tāvat sūtritam prathama adhyāye ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ iti
atra jñāna indriya pañka upādānam na indriya antara pratikṣepa artham

original: manasaḥ pṛthakprameyatayā uddeśāt anantarameva ca “yugapajjñānānutpattirmanaso liṅgam” iti lakṣaṇakaraṇāt abhyupagamasiddhāntanyāyena ca tadindriyatvaparīkṣaṇāt
analyzed: manasaḥ pṛthak prameya tayā uddeśāt anantaram eva ca yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam iti lakṣaṇa karaṇāt abhyupagama siddhānta nyāyena ca tad indriya tva parīkṣaṇāt
atas ca uktena samāna yogakṣema yukti pramāṇakaḥ karmendriya vargaḥ upalakṣaṇīyaḥ

original: “pravṛttirvāgbuddhiśarīrārambhaḥ” iti sūtre vācaḥ kaṇṭhokteḥ pāṇyādicatuṣṭayasya śārīravyāpārakaraṇatayā sūcanāditi //
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ vāc buddhi śarīra ārambhaḥ iti sūtre vācaḥ kaṇṭha ukteḥ pāṇi ādi catuṣṭayasya śārīra vyāpāra karaṇatayā sūcanāt iti

original: śarīrake tu “saptagaterviśeṣitatvācca” iti pūrvapakṣamupakṣipyāsādhayacca hastādīnāmapīndriyatvaṃ bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ--- “hastādayastu sthite  #
analyzed: śarīrake tu sapta gateḥ viśeṣita tvāt ca iti pūrvapakṣam upakṣipya asādhayat ca hasta ādīnām api indriya tvam bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ hasta ādayaḥ tu sthite
taḥ u na evam iti
bhūtebhyaḥ iti ca na upādāna abhiprāyam
ahaṅkāra upāttānām āpyāyaka bhūta vivakṣayā api tad upapatteḥ

original: tathā ca vedārthasaṃgrahe---“evamāhaṅkārikāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ bhūtaiścāpyāyanaṃ mahābhārata ucyate” iti /
analyzed: tathā ca vedārthasaṃgrahe evam āhaṅkārikāṇām indriyāṇām bhūtaiḥ ca āpyāyanam mahābhārataḥ ucyate iti
samādhānam ṛṣi antara vākyasya api samāna nyāyasya nirvāha artham

original: parasparaviruddhapramāṇavākyeṣu tātparyaviśeṣaparikalpanayā parihāra eva hi paṇḍitakṛtyam /
analyzed: paraspara viruddha pramāṇa vākyeṣu tātparya viśeṣa parikalpanayā parihāraḥ eva hi paṇḍita kṛtyam

original: anityamanovādibhirapi hi “annamayaṃ hi somya manaḥ“--- iti śrutirāpyāyanaparatayaiva yojyā /
analyzed: anitya manaḥ vādibhiḥ api hi anna mayam hi somya manaḥ iti śrutiḥ āpyāyana para tayā eva yojyā
tulyam idam anyatra api iti
yat tu bādhanā lakṣaṇam duḥkham tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ upavargaḥ iti
tatra duḥkha atyanta nivṛtteḥ apavarga tvam sarva aṅgīkṛtam

original: na ca tatrānandaḥ śrautaḥ kaṇṭhoktyāḥ pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: na ca tatra ānandaḥ śrautaḥ kaṇṭhoktyāḥ pratiṣidhyate

original: tadabhiprāye cānanyathāsiddhaṃ kimapi na liṅgaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tad abhiprāye ca ananyathāsiddham kim api na liṅgam paśyāmaḥ
atas eva hi bhūṣaṇa mate nitya sukha saṃvedana saṃbandha siddhiḥ apavarge sādhitā
etena pavargaḥ iti caturtha adhyāya vākyam api nirvyūḍham
tatra api ānanda niṣedha abhāvāt
yat ca śārīraka dvitīya adhyāya viruddham iha dvitīya adhyāye avayavi samarthanam iva ābhāti
tat api tad eka artham yojayitum śakyam
tathā hi na ca eka deśa upalabdhiḥ avayavi sadbhāvāt
sādhya tvāt avayavini saṃdehaḥ
sarva agrahaṇam avayavi asiddheḥ
dhāraṇa ākarṣaṇa upapatteḥ ca
senā vana vat grahaṇam iti ced na atīndriya tvāt aṇūnām
iti etāni hi tad sūtrāṇi
na tāni virudhyante
senā vana ādi vyāvṛtta avayavi ārambhaka tayā tad asamavāyi kāraṇa tva abhimata avasthā viśeṣa āpannaḥ

original: saṃghātaviśeṣa evāvayaviśabdena nirdiṃśyata ityavirodhāt tāvataiva upalambhavyavahāraviśeṣādeścaritārthatvāt /
analyzed: saṃghāta viśeṣaḥ eva avayavi śabdena nirdiṃśyate iti avirodhāt tāvatā eva upalambha vyavahāra viśeṣa ādeḥ caritārtha tvāt
atīndriya aṇu vacanam api pradīpa avayavānām iva aindriyikāṇām eva avasthā viśeṣeṇa atīndriya tva abhyupagamāt aviruddham
avyaktam eva hi triguṇa dravyam avasthā viśeṣāt ravyaktam bhavati iti āgamikāḥ
pratyekam upalambha ayogyānām api saṃhati viśeṣa rūpa avasthā bhedāt aindriyika tva tad tāratamya ādikam himānī cūrṇa puñja ādiṣu anārabdha avayaviṣu loka siddham
upamāna ākhya pramāṇa antara samarthanam tu nyāya ekadeśibhiḥ eva upamānasya anumāna antarbhāva pratikṣepa mātra para tayā nirvyūḍham
yat ca pūraṇa pradāha pāṭana anupalabdheḥ ca saṃbandha abhāvaḥ iti śabda artha saṃbandha abhāvam upakṣipya pariharatā śabda artha vyavasthānāt apratiṣedhaḥ
na sāmayika tvāt śabdāt arthe pratyayasya ityādinā sāmayika tvam uktam
tat api saṃpratipanna sāmayika tva dvārā anumāna ādi vilakṣaṇa saṃbandha viśeṣa khyāpana artham iti yojyam
anādinidhana avicchinna saṃpradāya veda vartinām padānām manu ādi vacana viruddha sāṃketika tva upapādana kḷpti asaṃbhavāt
yat ca mantra āyurveda prāmāṇya vat ca tad prāmāṇyam āpta prāmāṇyāt iti

original: etadapyanādinidhanasyaiva vedasya pratikalpamīśvareṇāptatamena yathāpūrvaṃ pravartanamabhisaṃdhāyeti sugamam //
analyzed: etat api anādinidhanasya eva vedasya pratikalpam īśvareṇa āptatamena yathāpūrvam pravartanam abhisaṃdhāya iti sugamam
varṇa anitya tva varṇanam tu na śruti ādi viruddham
pratyuta anukūlam eva

original: śārīrakadevatādhikaraṇe varṇānityatvamabhyupagamyaiva hi “ata eka ca nityatvam” “samānanāmarūpatvāccāvṛttāvapyavirodho darśanāt smṛteśca” iti  #
analyzed: śārīraka devatā adhikaraṇe varṇa anitya tvam abhyupagamya eva hi atas ca nitya tvam samāna nāma rūpa tvāt ca avṛttau api avirodhaḥ darśanāt smṛteḥ ca iti
veda nitya tvam sādhitam
yat tu jaiminīye śabda adhikaraṇe varṇa nitya tva samarthanam vyācakhyuḥ
sa tu vyākhyātṝṇām eva aparādhaḥ
asāṃketika vācaka ākāra nitya tva paratvena anya paratvāt tasya adhikaraṇasya
yat ca dvitīya adhyāya ante vyakti ākṛti jātayaḥ tu padārthaḥ iti uktam
tatra api na vaiśeṣika abhyupagata jāti svīkāre liṅgam paśyāmaḥ
na hi atra dravya guṇa ādi padārtha parisaṃkhyānam kriyate
te vibhakti antāḥ padam iti pratipādita pada vācya pradarśana paratvāt

original: anantaraṃ catisṛṇāmeva lakṣaṇamāha---“vyaktirguṇaviśeṣāśrayo mūrtiḥ““ākṛtirjātiliṅgākhyā” “samānaprasavātmikā jātiḥ” iti /
analyzed: anantaram ca tisṛṇām eva lakṣaṇam āha vyaktiḥ guṇa viśeṣa āśrayaḥ mūrtiḥ ākṛtiḥ jāti liṅga ākhyā samāna prasava ātmikā jātiḥ iti
iha tu vastu svarūpa nirūpita svarūpa viśeṣaka dharma svarūpa nirūpaka dharma viṣaya tayā yathāsaṃbhavam yojyam
atas na dvitīya adhyāye vedānta virodhaḥ
tṛtīye darśana sparśanābhyām eka artha grahaṇāt ityādikam bāhya antar indriya ādi nirūpaṇa ādikam ca atyanta upayuktam
na ca manaḥ nitya tva ādikam tatra sūtritam
yena tad utpatti ādi śruti kopaḥ
yat ca atra uktam gandha kleda pāka vyūha avakāśa dānebhyaḥ pāñcabhautikam śruti prāmāṇyāt ca iti
etat eva yathāśrutam siddhānta tayā svīkāryam

original: yadapi “gandharasarūpasparśaśabdānāṃ sparśaparyantāḥ pṛthivyāḥ” “aptejovāyūnāṃ pūrvapūrvamapohyākāśasyottaraḥ” iti guṇavyavasthāpanam,
analyzed: yat api gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdānām sparśa paryantāḥ pṛthivyāḥ ap tejaḥ vāyūnām pūrva pūrvam apohya ākāśasya uttaraḥ iti guṇa vyavasthāpanam
tatra tu tathā eva abhyupagame na vastu antara virodhaḥ
tathā api ākāśa ādiṣu śabda ādeḥ eka dvi tri catuṣpañca krameṇa purāṇeṣu pāṭhāt

original: ākāśānupraveśādanyatra śabda iti nirvāhe vārūvādyanupraveśāduttarottareṣu sparśādiriti nirvoḍhuṃ śakyatvāt,
analyzed: ākāśa anupraveśāt anyatra śabdaḥ iti nirvāhe vārūva ādi anupraveśāt uttarottareṣu sparśa ādiḥ iti nirvoḍhum śakya tvāt
upalambha anvaya vyatirekābhyām vyavasthāpanasya api sama tvāt
gandha ādi sūtram pṛthivyāḥ te santi eva iti ayoga vyavacchedena nirvāhyam
ākāśasya uttaraḥ iti atra tu tasya saḥ eva iti anya yoga vyavacchedena

original: kati kati caivaṃ sūtrāṇi kliṣṭāni parairapi niruhyante //
analyzed: kati kati ca evam sūtrāṇi kliṣṭāni paraiḥ api niruhyante

original: yacca---“svaguṇānnopalabhanta indriyāṇi kasmāditicet” “saguṇānamindriyabhāvāt” ityatra “na śabdaguṇopalabdheḥ” ityuktam;
analyzed: yat ca sva guṇān na upalabhante indriyāṇi kasmāt iti ced indriya bhāvāt iti atra na śabda guṇa upalabdheḥ iti uktam

original: tatrāpi śrotrendriyasya ākāśāpyāyitātvādāpyāyakaguṇasya tadguṇatāṃ paṭanailyapānīyasaurabhādivat prakalpoktamuttaram /
analyzed: tatra api śrotra indriyasya ākāśa āpyāyitā tvāt āpyāyaka guṇasya tad guṇa tām paṭa nailya pānīya saurabha ādi vat prakalpa uktam uttaram

original: athavā yathāgamamāhaṅkārikatvamindriyāṇāmajānataścodye bhūtāpyāyitendriyapakṣe sthitvaivedamuttaraṃ gūḍhābhiprāyeṇa dadīya iti /
analyzed: athavā yathāgamam āhaṅkārika tvam indriyāṇām a jānataḥ codye bhūta āpyāyita indriya pakṣe sthitvā eva idam uttaram gūḍha abhiprāyeṇa dadīya iti
etat uktam bhavati bhavatā kim indriya guṇa upalambha abhāvaḥ ucyate
kim vā tad āpyāyaka guṇa upalambha abhāvaḥ
pūrvatra aṅgīkāraḥ eva uttaram
śabda ādīnām an indriya guṇa tvāt
uttaratra vyabhicāraḥ iti
atas na vedānta virodha prasaṅgaḥ
caturthe dhyāye pravṛtti rāga dveṣa ādi nirūpaṇam
ātma nitya tva ādinā pretyabhāva ādi pratipādanam
animitta bhāva utpatti sarva anitya tva sarva nitya tva ādi nirūpaṇam ca atyanta anuguṇam
avayavi prasaṅgaḥ ca prāc ukta nyāyena netavyaḥ
pañcamaḥ tu jāti nigrahasthāna mātra upakṣīṇaḥ na kvacid tattve upakaroti
vyavahāra aṅga vimarśa saundarya asaundarya ādikam tu vāstava lakṣya lakṣaṇa yukti ādi parāmarśa vaijñānikaiḥ artha sthiti mātra anusārāt anādaraṇīyam

original: yat punararvāgbhirakṣacaraṇapañcādhyāyyāṃ kuśakāśāvalambena kaṇacaraṇakathāṃ niveśya naigamikyaḥ padavyo nirudhyante,
analyzed: yat punar arvāgbhiḥ akṣa caraṇa pañca adhyāyyām kuśa kāśa avalambena kaṇa caraṇa kathām niveśya naigamikyaḥ padavyaḥ nirudhyante

original: tatra tu nūnaṃ sa eva gautamaḥ svayamantaḥ prahasati //
analyzed: tatra tu nūnam saḥ eva gautamaḥ svayam antar prahasati
iti svīkāra pakṣaḥ

original: yadvā nātīva ca bahiṣkāro nātīva ca parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā na atīva ca bahiṣkāraḥ na atīva ca parigrahaḥ
sāṃkhya ādi vat iha api syāt
upajīvya bahu tvena vidyā sthāna niveśanam
viruddha aṃśa eka viṣayā sūtra ādiṣu bahiṣkriyā
nyā pa pra
adhikāri vivecanam
niyata adhikāraḥ ca ayam nyāya vistaraḥ
adhikārāt ca niyataḥ syāt ayam nyāya vistaraḥ
apratyavāyaḥ māhātmyāt dayāluḥ śāstram abravīt
sarva adhikāram iti etat asamīkṣita bhāṣitam
katham āgama vṛttāntam anadhīta āgamāḥ viduḥ
niṣiddhe prerayan tān vā katham kāruṇikaḥ bhavet
na ca śakyā nara śiraḥ pāvitrya ādi anumā kṣatiḥ
vihāya āgama makṣā ādyaiḥ dvidhā tatra api viplavaḥ
śrutyām hi anadhikāri tvāt tad anyatra avyavasthiteḥ
dharma kṣobhām umā bhaṅge katham śūdra ādayaḥ kṣamāḥ
atha traivarṇikaiḥ ukte tu anyaḥ viśvasiti iti api
svayam nyāya vicāre phalati anadhikāri tām
pratyakṣa anumayoḥ yatra nityam veda an apekha tā
tatra apa śūdra bhāṣya uktā śūdra ādeḥ api adhikriyā
caturdaśa api sthānāni bhagavān dharma vidyayoḥ
na spraṣṭavyāni śūdraiḥ iti abravīt āśvamedhike
aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ
purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśa
yāni uktāni mayā samyak vidyā sthānāni bhārata
utpannāni pavitrāṇi pāvana artham tathā eva ca
tasmāt tāni na śūdrasya spraṣṭavyāni kathañcana
iti
tasmāt etāni traivarṇikaiḥ adhyetavyāni
tatra brāhmaṇena vidyā prāptaye dharma anuṣṭhānāya ca adhigantavyāni
kṣatriya vaiśyābhyām dharma anuṣṭhānāya eva
tathā śaṅkhena vidyā sthānāni anukramya uktam etāni brāhmaṇaḥ dhikurute
sa ca vṛttim darśayati itareṣām iti
evam eva dharma śāstra saṃgrāhakaiḥ samarthitam
tatas ca yeṣām karma brahma mīmāṃsā avaseya tattva hita rūpa prameya cintā adhikāraḥ
teṣām eva tātparya paryavasāyi tayā iti siddham
nyā pa pra
māna meya ādi niyatiḥ nirdeṣa ukteḥ ca māna tā
virodhataḥ
pratyakṣa ādiṣu asiddheṣu na kalpeta kathañcana
evamādi upayogena munibhiḥ nyāya vistaraḥ
veda anugrahaṇāt dharma vidyā sthāna tayā uditaḥ
āgama ākhya pramāṇe tu saṃśuddhe nyāya vistarāt
tad viśeṣasya mīmāṃsā sādhayet dharma māna tām
prameyasya api saṃśuddhiḥ antatas brahma cintanāt
iha tasya niveśaḥ tu tādarthya ādi prasiddhaye
pramāṇam eva asya śāstrasya prādhānyataḥ viṣayaḥ
tatra prekṣāvat adhicikīrṣā siddhi artham prameya tattva jñānam hāna upādāna dvārā niḥśreyasa hetuḥ

original: tacca saparikarāt pramāṇāt---iti paramparayā prayojanajñāpanāya pradarśanamātramihābhimatam /
analyzed: tat ca sa parikarāt paramparayā prayojana jñāpanāya pradarśana mātram iha abhimatam
atas pradhāna viṣaya tayā
prameya ādi sādhaka tayā ca pramāṇam prameyāt api pūrvam ucyate

original: tatra vyavacchedyatvāṅgatvādimukhena saṃśayādayo 'pi caturdaśa yathāyathaṃ nirūpyante /
analyzed: tatra vyavacchedya tva aṅga tva ādi mukhena saṃśaya ādayaḥ caturdaśa yathāyatham nirūpyante
na ca ṣoḍaśa tve nirbandhaḥ
atathātva viparyaya tva ādi upādhi antara adhīna saṃgraha vibhajanābhyām nyūna adhika uddeśasya api śakya tvāt upayoga anupayoga aviśeṣāt ca
etāvat eva gautamasya api hṛdayam iti
nyā pa pra
pramāṇa apramāṇa vyavasthāpanam
asti tāvat idam pramāṇam idam apramāṇam iti prasiddhaḥ laukika parīkṣaka vyavahāra ghaṇṭāpathaḥ
tad anādare tu nirāśraya tayā parīkṣaṇasya api anudayaḥ
vyavahāraḥ hi jagataḥ bhavati ālambane kvacid

original: na tatsāmānyato nāsti kathantā tu parīkṣyate //
analyzed: na tat sāmānyatas na asti kathantā tu parīkṣyate
sāmānya niścita arthena viśeṣe tu bubhutsite
parīkṣā hi ucitā sva iṣṭa pramāṇa utpādana ātmikā
na sarvasya apramāṇa tvam sva pakṣasya svatas kṣateḥ
na sarvasya pramāṇa tvam sva pakṣasya anyatas kṣateḥ
siddhi asiddhyoḥ sva pakṣasya siddhā loka vyavasthitiḥ
tad siddhi asiddhyoḥ tvad pakṣaḥ na kathañcana sidhyati
pramāṇena pramāṇasya bādhaḥ sva vyāhateḥ hataḥ

original: apramāṇena tadbādhe sādhanaṃ ca tato na kim //
analyzed: apramāṇena tad bādhe sādhanam ca tatas na kim
apramāṇāt pramāṇāt vā māna siddhiḥ na ced na tat
yatas pramāṇataḥ tasya siddhiḥ sva para rakṣiṇī
bādhā bādha vyavasthā api mānataḥ syāt ravi avasthitāt
anyathā tu avyavasthāyāḥ na vyavasthā iti avasthiteḥ
sarvatra anirṇaye na staḥ saṃśaya utpatti nirṇayau
yathā tad koṭi tad siddhiḥ tathā anyatra api yujyate
dharmi sādhāraṇa ākāra koṭīnām pūrva niścaye
asau ayam ayam vā iti hi āvirbhavati saṃśayaḥ
sarvatra saṃśayaḥ tāvat na sarvasya api dṛśyate
sarvam saṃdigdham iti te nipuṇasya asti niścayaḥ
saṃśayaḥ ca na saṃdigdhaḥ saṃdigdha advaita vādinaḥ
dūram gatvā api durvāraḥ saṃśaye nirṇayaḥ tava
māna amāna vibhāge taḥ sāmānyena vyavasthite
kvācitka saṃśaya ucchittyai lakṣaṇam saṃpracakṣate

original: tatra vyutpattivivakṣābhedāt pramitiṃ tatkaraṇaṃ ca yathecchaṃ pramāṇamāhurityavocāma,
analyzed: tatra vyutpatti vivakṣā bhedāt pramitim tad karaṇam ca yatheccham pramāṇam āhuḥ iti avocāma
āśraya prāmāṇyasya anādeśika tvāt
āpta prāmāṇyāt āpta ukta tva hetoḥ prāmāṇyāt iti arthaḥ

original: na hi vaktṛprāmāṇyaṃ vākyaprāmāṇya upayujyate laukikavākyeṣu;
analyzed: na hi vaktṛ prāmāṇyam vākya prāmāṇye upayujyate laukika vākyeṣu
kintu kāraṇa doṣa abhāvaḥ
dvidhā api pramitiḥ eva śodhyā
nyā pa pra

original: tatrāsmadīyā eva kecidanyathākhyātimicchantaḥ smṛteḥ prāmāṇyamanicchantaḥ samyaganubhavaḥ prameti lakṣayanti;
analyzed: tatra asmadīyāḥ eva kecid anyathā khyātim icchantaḥ smṛteḥ prāmāṇyam an icchantaḥ samyak anubhavaḥ pramā iti lakṣayanti
ubhayam icchantaḥ
ubhayam an icchantaḥ
anubhūtiḥ pramā iti
evaṃprāyāṇi ca vādi antara uktāni lakṣaṇāni

original: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ--- yathāvasthitavyavahārānuguṇaṃ jñānaṃ prameti /
analyzed: vayam tu brūmaḥ yathā avasthita vyavahāra anuguṇam jñānam pramā iti
yathārtha khyātim akhyātim anyathā khyātim eva vā
icchadbhiḥ na vimantavyam idam loka anusārataḥ
na yuktam iti vakṣyate
abādhita smṛteḥ loke pramāṇa tva parigrahāt
buddha āgama ādi tyāge ca na hetuḥ smṛti mūla tā
viśuddha smṛti mūle mānava ādau prasaṅgataḥ

original: bhrāntiṃ pramāto bhindanto na cāhuḥ smṛtimānatām /
analyzed: bhrāntim pramātar bhindantaḥ na ca āhuḥ smṛti māna tām
smṛti tvam eva hi vyaktam aprāmāṇyam bhavat mate
pīta śaṅkha bhrama ādau ca na hi etat upapadyate

original: cakṣuṣaiva hi śaṅkhādeḥ pītimādeśca tatra dhīḥ //
analyzed: cakṣuṣā eva hi śaṅkha ādeḥ pītima ādeḥ ca tatra dhīḥ
tatas ca pratipattau vā vyavahāra udaye vā
viparyaya ādeḥ vyāvṛttiḥ evam eva hi sidhyati
yat kiñcid anyathātvam hi vaiparītyam iti iṣyate
ātma khyāti ādi vādeṣu api anyathātvam a vāritam
bhrama pravṛtti bādhā ādeḥ anyathā na hi saṃbhavaḥ
evam sati anyathā dhīḥ tad sāmagrī vā api lāghavāt
ayathā vyavahārasya hetuḥ iti avaśiṣyate
sarvaiḥ api anyathā khyātiḥ dustyaja tvāt laghīyasī
tad vādinā api avarjya tvāt
svārasyam anyathā ākhyātau akhyātau lāghavam sthitam
iti darśayitum bhāṣye dvitayam tat anujjhitam
yat nātha muni miśra ādyaiḥ yathārtha khyāti sādhanam
tat loka buddhi anārohāt vaibhavam kecid ūcire
mānāt rūpya ādi sattve pi tayoḥ anyatarat dhruvam
kārya akṣama tva agrahaṇāt tad kṣama tva graheṇa vā
khyāti antarāṇām doṣāḥ tu tad tad siddhānta śīlane
svayam evā unmiṣanti eva saṃgrahāt kiñcid ucyate

original: tatrātmakhyātau tāvat--- anyadvijñānamastīti dhīranyaviṣayā na vā /
analyzed: tatra ātma khyātau tāvat anyat vijñānam asti iti dhīḥ anya viṣayā na vā
ādyā ṛthasya api tadvat dhīḥ anyatra ekā eva dhīḥ bhavet
saṃtāna antara vijñānam sva saṃtāne kṣaṇa antaram

original: yā dhīḥ sādhayate sā hi svato bāhyaṃ vigāhate //
analyzed: yā dhīḥ sādhayate sā hi svatas bāhyam vigāhate
saha upalambha niyamaḥ saṃvidaḥ grāhya lakṣma ca
bodhe pi arthaḥ iva iti evam jñāna artha aikyam na tat bhavet
doṣa ādi hetu jālasya pi yathā iṣyate
adhiṣṭhānasya mithyā ve pi anivāryaḥ tathā bhramaḥ
tatas mādhyamikasya eva pakṣaḥ tatra avaśiṣyate
na ca tatra api nistāraḥ sarvathā anupapattitaḥ
asattvam laukikam brūṣe lokottaram atha api vā
na niṣedhaḥ nirupadhiḥ pūrvatra anyat na dhī padam

original: catuṣkoṭivimuktaṃ ca tattvaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na vā /
analyzed: catuṣkoṭi vimuktam ca tattvam prāmāṇikam na vā

original: pūrvatra tāvatī sattā na cet taddhīrasanmatiḥ //
analyzed: pūrvatra tāvatī sattā na ced tad dhīḥ asat matiḥ

original: anyeṣāṃ ca niradhiṣṭhānakhyātau --- atrāsadeva bhavatāmatreti khyāyate na vā /
analyzed: anyeṣām ca niradhiṣṭhāna khyātau atra asat eva bhavatām atra iti khyāyate na vā
ādye siddham adhiṣṭhānam dvitīye khyāti apahnavaḥ
kim ca sva netra niṣṭhyūtam timiram timira arditaiḥ
keśa stabaka sādṛśyāt tathā bhāti evam īdṛśāḥ
yadi api a vidyamāna ūrthaḥ vidyamāna tayā sphuret
tathā api asau adhiṣṭhānam sva deśa ādau mitaḥ hi saḥ
idantvena pratīta irthe tad āropam pare viduḥ
tasmin idantu āropaḥ te phalataḥ tulya tā dvayoḥ

original: anirvacanīyakhyātau --- anirvācyatayā vastu nirucyeta na vā tvayā /
analyzed: anirvacanīya khyātau anirvācya tayā vastu nirucyeta na vā tvayā
ādye virodhaḥ vividhaḥ dvitīye smat mata sthitiḥ
sat asat vyatirekaḥ viruddhaḥ yadi gṛhyate

original: sadasadrūpatā kiṃ nu pratītā tu na gṛhyate //
analyzed: sat asat rūpa tā kim nu pratītā tu na gṛhyate
an uṣṇa aśīta vat tucchāt brahmaṇaḥ ca atireki tā
sādhyeta khyāti bādhā ādeḥ yadi siddham tat atra naḥ
na ca viśvasya sva rasāt upajāyate
apratiṣṭhita yuktyā tu bādhaḥ brahmā api saṃspṛśet
nāśāt sat itara tvam ca nāśa kāle yadi iṣyate
sva kāle yadi bādhaḥ syāt nāśasya api anirūpaṇam

original: nityatvena śrutānāṃ ca keṣāṃ cinna hi nāśitā /
analyzed: nitya tvena śrutānām ca keṣām cit na hi nāśitā
bhāga asiddhaḥ tatas hetuḥ na ca aikyam nāśa bādhayoḥ
nirviṣaya khyātau viṣaya alīka bhāva ādau khyāti antara parigrahaḥ
anullekhaḥ tu rūpya ādi dhīḥ iti uktyā nibarhitaḥ
nyā pa pra
nigamanam
tatas ca atra anyathā dhīḥ vā tad hetu matiḥ eva vā
bhrāntiḥ vastu virūpasya vyavahārasya kāraṇam

original: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau pratyakṣādhyāye prathamamāhnikam
analyzed: iti śrī kavi tārkikasiṃhasya sarva tantra svatantrasya śrīmat veṅkaṭanāthasya vedānta ācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāya pariśuddhau pratyakṣa adhyāye prathamam āhnikam
